mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(commentno, movieno, memno, reply, cdate, cname) VALUES (comments_seq.nextval, #{movieno}, #{memno}, #{reply}, sysdate, #{cname})
mapper.select: SELECT commentno, movieno, memno, reply, cdate, favorite, cname FROM comments ORDER BY commentno DESC
SELECT commentno, movieno, memno, reply, cdate, favorite, cname FROM comments WHERE movieno = #{movieno} ORDER BY commentno DESC
SELECT commentno, movieno, memno, reply, cdate, favorite, cname FROM comments WHERE commentno=#{commentno}
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET reply=#{reply} WHERE commentno=#{commentno}
